results.content: The course was really helpful. Bernard has explained each course content in detail. This course is very helpful for those who are not familiar with React and Node (as shopify has provided documentation using these libraries) and wanted to use PHP, HTML and JS to develope the app. Also, Bernard helped with each and every query that I have asked during the course.
results.content_html: The course was really helpful. Bernard has explained each course content in detail. This course is very helpful for those who are not familiar with React and Node (as shopify has provided documentation using these libraries) and wanted to use PHP, HTML and JS to develope the app. Also, Bernard helped with each and every query that I have asked during the course.

results.content: Still a little early to elaborate but the instructor speaks very clear and is able to convey his instructions. This is a big plus for me.

results.content: This is very good, but I would have liked to have some documentation or links listed.

response.content: Hello Alexander! Thank you for writing a kind review. I'm very happy that you are enjoying the course. About the documentation, I believe I am attaching links to lessons unless I missed one or two. I would appreciate if you post the things that you need in the QnA and I'd love to help you out. Once again, thank you!
